title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Dining Table and Chairs, Sideboard", 1934–35
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with calculations in lower left corner; inscribed in blue pencil on verso: PERSPECTIVES/YACHT INTER.
description: Probably dining room of Lady Esther Yacht. Partial view of oval dining table in foreground at left, oval shape in center of table. Partial view of three chairs: one armchair, two sides. Chairs have upholstered backs and seats. On far wall at left is shallow bar/shelf with rounded corner at right. Two large rectangular windows with horizontal blinds on far wall. Right side of room is rounded. Large rectangular sideboard against rounded portion of room; three small square windows with horizontal blinds above sideboard. Three long rectangular drawers at center of sideboard with long horizontal pulls. Tray, or elevated surface above drawers. Partial view of window to far right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Dining Table and Chairs, Sideboard", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-312-1.
